title: Unable To Login Thinks I Am Ofline
body: I have know idea whats going on i get the message saying cant login im offline well i am online.

replies.body: Exactly the same problem here. What happened with you guys? Did you get back on?
Happened to me too. I exited the game while in-game to fix my lag and when I got back to the login screen it said that i was offline. Hah now I'm gonna get leavers..yay!
